title: Why doesn\'t the health department allow pets at outside dining areas? (Pita Delite on So. College recently posted a sign tsaying that due to a complaint, dogs are no longer allowed on the sidewalk dining area) Many restaurants in Boulder, Denver, Charlotte, Chapel Hill and area beaches allow properly leashed, quiet dogs to remain tableside with their owners.
